|flags=VDSL2, ADSL2+ |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;3.4.11; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{4}(_5G)?$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=F4:F2:6D |oui_eth=F4:F2:6D }} {{TagLine|AC1900 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit VDSL2/ADSL2+ Modem Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-15_Archer-VR900.html Product page] (Annex A) ===See also=== *[[TP-LINK Archer VR900 v2.0]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM63137 (@1GHz) :(VR900 v1.0 - BCM63168, TD-W8960N - BCM 6358) [http://wiki.kitz.co.uk/index.php/BCM_routers Kitz wiki] *[[TP-LINK Archer VR900v 1.0]] (Annex B/J + VoIP/DECT) [http://www.tp-link.de/products/details/cat-15_Archer-VR900v.html PPage] :[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tp-link_archer_vr900v_1.0 ''TP-LINK Archer VR900v'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[[TP-LINK Archer VR200v]] AC750 (Annex B/J + VoIP/DECT) [http://www.tp-link.de/products/details/cat-15_Archer-VR200v.html PPage] :[https://www.cyberport.de/tp-link-archer-vr200v-ac750-wlan-ac-gigabit-router-dsl-modem-dect-5604-124_232.html ''TP-LINK Archer VR200v'' on '''CyberPort''']
